meanings.definition: Engaging in casual conversation or small talk in order to network or socialize.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys shmoozing with her coworkers during lunch breaks.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone was shmoozing and having a good time.
meanings.sent3: While waiting in line, he started shmoozing with the person next to him about the weather.
meanings.sent4: The birds outside the window seemed to be shmoozing with each other in their own chirpy language.
meanings.sent5: The sound of people shmoozing in the cafe created a warm and friendly atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Flattering or ingratiating someone in order to gain favor or advantage.
meanings.sent1: He was constantly shmoozing the boss to get a promotion.
meanings.sent2: She was caught shmoozing the teacher to get better grades.
meanings.sent3: The cat was shamelessly shmoozing the owner for extra treats.
meanings.sent4: The politician was expertly shmoozing the crowd to win their votes.
meanings.sent5: The salesman's smooth shmoozing convinced the customer to make a purchase.
